actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide for the deportation from the United States of certain aliens who engage in demonstrations in support of acts of anti-American terrorism.

summary.text: Provides for the deportation of foreign nationals in the United States who engage in public demonstrations in support of anti-American terrorism.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the deportation from the United States of certain aliens who engage in demonstrations in support of acts of anti-American terrorism.
